exposurecontrol: Creative Zone modes (1) Program AE (program-shift possible) (2) Shutter-priority AE (3) Aperture-priority AE (4) Manual exposure (including bulb) Basic Zone modes (1) Scene Intelligent Auto (Program AE, non-shiftable) (2) Flash Off (3) Creative Auto (4) Portrait (5) Landscape (6) Close-up (7) Sports (8) Night Portrait
weight: Approx. 16.93 oz. (CIPA Standard) Approx. 15.34 oz. (Body only)
flashtype: Auto pop-up, retractable, built-in flash in the pentamirror
shutterspeeds: 1/4000 to 30 sec., Bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode.); X-sync at 1/200 sec.30 - 1/4000 sec. & Bulb; manually settable in 1/3-, 1/2-stop increments30 - 1/4000 sec. & Bulb; manually settable in 1/3-, 1/2-, 1-stop increments30 - 1/4000 sec. & Bulb; manually settable in 1/3-, 1/2-, 1-stop increments
customization: 11 Custom Functions with 33 settings settable with the camera
mirror: Quick-return half mirror (transmission: reflection ratio of 40:60)
liveviewfunction: Shooting Modes Still photo shooting and video shooting Focusing 1) Autofocus - FlexiZone-Single - Face Detection Live mode - Quick mode 2) Manual Focus Metering Modes Real-time Evaluative metering with image sensor Metering Range EV 0 to EV 20 (At 23degreeC/73degreeF, ISO 100) Grid Display (1) Grid 1: Pair of vertical and horizontal lines (2) Grid 2: 5 vertical and 3 horizontal lines Exposure Simulation Provided
imagetype: Design rule for Camera File System 2.0 and Exif 2.30
viewfindercoverage: Vertical / Horizontal Approx. 95%Approx. 95% horizontal/vertical at 0.85xApprox. 95% horizontal/vertical at 0.85xApprox. 95% horizontal/vertical at 0.80x
videorecording: Full HD 1920 x 1080Full HD 1920 x 1080Full HD 1920 x 1080HD 1280 x 720
shutterspeed: 1/4000 to 30 sec., Bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode.); X-sync at 1/200 sec. Settable in 1/3- or 1/2-stop increments.
drivemodes: (1) Single shooting (2) Continuous shooting (3) 10-sec. self-timer (4) 2-sec. self-timer (5) Continuous shooting after 10-sec. self-timer (2 to 10 shots)
playback: Display Format (1) Single image display Single image, basic information, detailed information, histogram display (2) Index display 4-image index and 9-image index. (3) Jump display (Image jump w/ Main Dial) 1/10/100 images, shooting date, by folder, movies, stills, rating
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 5.10 x 3.93 x 3.07 inchesApprox. 5.2 x 3.9 x 3.1 inchesApprox. 5.2 x 3.9 x 3.1 inchesApprox. 5.1 x 3.9 x 3.0 inches
movierecording: [Full HD] 1920 x 1080 (30 fps/25 fps/24 fps): 330 MB/min. [HD] 1280 x 720 (60 fps/50fps): 330 MB/min. [SD] 640 x 480 (30 fps/25fps): 82.5 MB/min.
afpoints: 9-point AF (f/5.6 cross-type AF point at center)
flashrange: Up to 17mm focal length (equivalent to approx. 28mm in 135 format)
viewfinderinformation: 1) AF information (AF points, focus confirmation light) 2) Exposure information (Shutter speed, aperture, ISO speed, AE lock, Exposure level, exposure warning) 3) Flash information (Flash ready, flash exposure compensation, high-speed sync, FE lock, red-eye reduction light) 4) Image information (Highlight tone priority, Monochrome shooting, maximum burst, white balance correction, SD card information)
maximumburst: (1) JPEG: 69 shots (2) RAW: 6 shots (3) RAW+JPEG: 4 shots
meteringsystem: 63-zone SPC TTL metering with selectable modes
isorange: ISO 100 - 6400  (Expandable to H: 12,800)ISO 100 - 12,800, ISO 25600 via Custom FunctionISO 100 - 6400 (ISO 12800 via Custom Function)ISO 100 - 6400
aelock: Auto AE Lock: Applied in One-Shot AF mode with evaluative metering when focus is achieved. Manual: By AE lock button in P, Tv and Av modes
movieformat: MOV (image data: H.264; audio: Linear PCM (monaural))
afassistbeam: 1) Intermittent firing of built-in flash. 2) Effective range: Approx. 4 m/13.1 ft at center, approx. 3.5 m/11.5 ft at periphery.
brightnessadjustment: Adjustable to one of seven brightness levels
eyepoint: Approx. 21 mm (At -1m-1 from the eyepiece lens center)
shuttertype: Vertical-travel, mechanical, focal-plane shutter with all speeds electronically controlled. Electronic 1st curtain. Only 2nd curtain mechanically controlled.
remotecontrolsupport: Compatible with Remote Switch RS-60E3. There is no wireless remote control sensor.
compatiblelenses: EF and EF-S LensesEF and EF-S LensesEF and EF-S LensesEF and EF-S Lenses
depthoffieldpreview: No depth-of-field preview button (Enabled with C.Fn 9-4)
exposurecompensation: (1) Manual: +/-5 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-stop increments (2) AEB : +/-2 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-stop increments
focusingmodes: (1) Autofocus - One-Shot AF - Predictive AI Servo AF - AI Focus AF (Switches between One-Shot AF and AI Servo AF automatically) (2) Manual focus (MF)
